name: Temy
description:
Temy provides convenient software development services for full-fledged companies and startups implementing their ideas into rewarding software solutions. 
Founded in 2014Â Temy has proved to be successful and a fast-growing Ukrainian company. Now we have two development offices in Lviv and Kyiv. Our individual approach to every client, attention to details, in-time task delivery and ability to find talents in a very short time frames have helped us to establish the long-term and successful relations with many clients in the Germany, Israel, USA, Switzerland. 
We're opened to new opportunities and adore challenging projects.
